Start: ^I head over to the cafe for some breakfast. I could use the meal.
^I spot Max doing their daily mopping.
^they're as carefree as ever doing that, and only notice me as I start to sit down with my meal.

b: ^, didn't I tell ya to go to bed?"
^I shrug. I'm not that fatigued. at least, I won't be after I eat.
^[Max] "Well, If you say so. You still shouldn't be staying up so late."
^[Max] "That's good. Eduardo's a good guy, but he underestimates how easily he can influence people."

Start: ^Max starts to go back to their mopping, when Timothy runs into the room.
^He looks happy, but also nervous. wonder what's up?
^[Timothy] "Oh, I'm just got up all bright and early, like you asked!"
^"Y'know, I'm really glad you're adjusting here nicely."
^[Max] "Yeah Man! with an attitude like that, You'll be all better, and ready to get back out there in no time!"
^[Trissa] "Yo! Max, Can I talk to you for a second?"
^Timothy seems to deflate, as he goes off to get his breakfast.
^He takes his tray and plops himself at a table across the cafe.
^He looks kind of sad. I should...

c: ^I should give the little fella some space.
^I eat my breakfast in quiet comfort. @the relaxing meal lowered Fatigue significantly and Stress slightly
^Finished with my meal, I head off, leaving Timothy where he is.

Start: ^Move over there, and have breakfast with Timothy

c: ^I pick up my meal, and go over to Timothy.
^I Sit down with Timothy, and chat with him while we eat.
^The food is invigorating and Timothy seems to relax as we talk.
^the chat with Timothy also improved Awareness,Grace, and Expression faintly.
